To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private BeltHold _belthold;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_belthold = BeltHold(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_belthold.IsReady)
{
    var current = _belthold.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.belthold = self.BeltHold(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.belthold.IsReady:
    current = self.belthold.Current.Value
